title: Dedicated website for ’GotaGoGama’ to submit proposals, issues
body_lines: The Prime Minister’s office has launched a special website through which the protesters at GotaGoGama will be able to submit their proposals and any issues they are faced with, UNP Deputy Leader Ruwan Wijewardene said today.
Mr. Wijewardene who was assigned by the Prime Minister to look into the issues faced by the GotaGoGama protesters said the protesters will now be able to communicate via pmoffice.gov.lk.
“Those who come up with practical and constructive proposals will be allowed to meet Premier Ranil Wickremesinghe for a discussion,” he added.
“I hope I would be able to team up with the protesters and win their demands,” he added further. (Yohan Perera)
